entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 4 with temperature falling to plus 1 this afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Rain ending this morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating early this morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 4 with temperature falling to plus 1 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 2.
